===Etymology===
* {{Lang|Setekh|egy=𓋴<span style="position:relative; bottom:.3em; font-size:150%; margin-left:.1em;">𓏏</span><span style="position:relative; margin-left:-.7em;">𓄡𓀭</span> stẖ|egy_rm=setekh}}, more commonly {{w|Set (deity)|Set}}, is a god of deserts, storms, disorder, violence, and foreigners in ancient Egyptian religion.
